decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Condition : 2 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 3 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings, or outlets for cooking extraction shall be installed on the southern elevation of the development hereby approved.

Condition : 5 - The roof area of the extension hereby permitted shall not be used as a balcony, roof garden or similar amenity area without the grant of further specific permission from the Local Planning Authority.

Condition : 6 - No demolition or construction work shall take place on the site except between the hours of 8.00 a.m. to 6.00 p.m. on Monday to Friday and 9.00 a.m. to 12.30 p.m. on Saturdays and Public Holidays without the prior agreement of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 7 - The windows formed in the flank  elevations shall be obscure glazed, hinged to open inwards and shall not be repaired or replaced otherwise than with obscured glazing.

Condition : 8 - The side wall of the utility room facing No. 16 shall be rendered and painted white. The existing white rendering at the side of the property facing No.16 shall be retained, or if it is replaced it shall also be white rendering.
description: Amended plans for the approved scheme ref 01234/18/P6 dated 09/03/2006 for the erection of part two storey part single storey rear extension erection of single storey side extension alteration to garage roof incorporating external and internal alterations erection of new front boundary fencing and approved plans 01234/18/P7 dated 21/12/06 for the "creation of basement with lightwell to rear elevation to the existing house" to incorporate revised external and internal alterations, with changes to elevations of the proposed conservatory
